column4: I'm experiencing problems with Compiz on my Xubuntu 10.10 system, could someone help me?
Because I wanted to make sure someone was listenting, is rather long.  But, okay I will state my question.

I am running Xubuntu 10.10 and I installed compiz-core with the plugins, the settings manager and whatnot.  I have Nvidia GeForce 8400 GS, Compiz Check said I was blacklisted and Compiz may not work, but I continued to see if it would.  It obviously does not work, but now my Window Headers do not appear unless I run Compiz I un-installled it and they do not appear on my Windows.  So I had to re-install it to get them working, how can I get
Anyone have a clue what to do?  I'd rather not re-install my system..
Guess not...oh well I'll just re-install my OS then.
you have to tell xfce to use the original window manager of xfce--> xfwm4
So I can now safely un-install Compiz?
And my Window Headers will still be there.
Can I remove Compiz from my Computer and restart it, and my Window Headers will still be there?
i really dunno for sure never used xfce. maybe in #xubuntu you can confirm
Okay, thank you erUSUL I guess I will check with Xubuntu chat.
